buginformation.summary: jsoup converts svg image svg img
buginformation.description: when parse html page with svg element which contains image element the image element replaced img but this not correct the image must image example input svg width 560 height 150 image xlink href myimage jpg 100 height 140 width 230 svg output svg width 560 height 150 img xlink href myimage jpg 100 height 140 width 230 svg the problem seems line 457 html tree builder state java the text was updated successfully but these errors were encountered jhy closed this 158 nov 2013 zazi added commit dswarm jsoup that referenced this issue oct 2015 don parse img image when svg 179b 817 fixes jhy 364 sign for free join this conversation git hub already have account sign comment assignees one assigned labels none yet projects none yet milestone milestone linked pull requests successfully merging pull request may close this issue none yet participant
